jobListings.description: We are looking for experienced candidates for a full-stack software developer position. Experience with JavaScript, React, and Node.js is required.
Candidates with experience in project management and business analysis are sought. The ideal candidate should be familiar with Agile methodologies and have strong customer relations skills.
We are looking for an architect experienced in the construction industry, proficient in Autocad and SketchUp, who can actively participate in the drawing and implementation of projects.
We are seeking candidates with experience in financial analysis and reporting, with at least 3 years of experience in the banking and finance sector.
We need a nurse experienced in patient care and nursing services who can adapt to flexible working hours.
We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented graphic designer with expertise in Photoshop and Illustrator to work in an advertising agency.
We are seeking an English teacher with at least 2 years of experience and an English teaching diploma to work in a private language course.
We need a mechanical engineer experienced in the automotive industry, with expertise in production and quality control processes, and good teamwork skills.
We are looking for a sales representative with strong persuasion skills and experience in the telecommunications sector to meet sales targets.
A food engineer is needed to work in our food production facility, ensuring compliance with hygiene and quality standards, and holding HACCP and ISO 22000 certifications.
We are seeking a mobile app developer with experience in developing applications for iOS and Android platforms, proficient in Swift and Kotlin.
An experienced and certified electrical technician is needed to work on electrical installations and maintenance.
We need a site manager with high field experience and an engineering degree to manage projects on construction sites.
An interior architect with experience in interior design and project planning, proficient in AutoCAD and 3D Max, is required.
We are looking for a logistics specialist who can manage shipping and logistics processes, with strong planning and organizational skills.
